casebody.data:
COAST VENTURE XXVX, INC. v. DISTER CORPORATION (AC 17287)

O’Connell, C. J., and Schaller and Dupont, Js.

Argued September 21 officially released November 3, 1998 Richard E. Minton, for the appellant (plaintiff). Gerald E. Farrell, Sr., for the appellee (defendant).

Opinion

PER CURIAM.

This case is controlled by our decision in Dister Corp. v. Northco, Inc., 50 Conn. App. 764, 719 A.2d 485 (1998), which we have decided today.

The judgment is affirmed.
